Package com.flipfit.business

Interface UserBusinessInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserBusiness
public interface UserBusinessInterface
Author:
M J Avani Interface defining the business operations for user management. This contract includes methods for user registration, authentication, and profile editing for both customers and gym owners.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    authenticateUser(User user)
    Authenticates a user based on their credentials (e.g., email and password).
    boolean
    editProfile(Customer customer)
    Edits the profile information of an existing customer.
    boolean
    registerCustomer(Customer customer)
    Registers a new customer in the system.
    boolean
    registerGymOwner(GymOwner gymOwner)
    Registers a new gym owner in the system.

  • Method Details

    • registerCustomer

      boolean registerCustomer(Customer customer)
      Registers a new customer in the system.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object containing the registration details.
      Returns:
      true if the customer was successfully registered, false otherwise.

    • authenticateUser

      boolean authenticateUser(User user)
      Authenticates a user based on their credentials (e.g., email and password).
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the credentials to be authenticated.
      Returns:
      true if the user's credentials are valid, false otherwise.

    • editProfile

      boolean editProfile(Customer customer)
      Edits the profile information of an existing customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object with the updated profile details.
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • registerGymOwner

      boolean registerGymOwner(GymOwner gymOwner)
      Registers a new gym owner in the system.
      Parameters:
      gymOwner - The GymOwner object containing the registration details.
      Returns:
      true if the gym owner was successfully registered, false otherwise.
